_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CSS Panel
author: shaikhnedab@gmsil.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# TS3 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk add --update --no-cache && apk add git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "Pulling the Pterodactyl Discord Bot from github"

git clone https://github.com/ShiNxz/CSS-Panel.git

echo "Nodejs Version"
node -v

echo "NPM Version Version"
npm -v

echo "PNPM Version Version"
pnpm install

echo "PNPM Version Version"
pnpm -v

echo "PNPM Version Version"
pnpm build
